title: Should we repeat the night time adkhar if we sleep again in the morning? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: hell says there are some duas we have to recite before sleeping are these do us only meant for sleeping in the night only or whenever we sleep do we have to recite these the most authentic opinion is that if you go to sleep at ten o'clock eleven o'clock p.m you say the dues of bedtime if you wake up before fajr and then pray fajr and then want to go back to sleep you're not obliged to make these duds again because you have done it for the night if someone wants to do it just in case more of goodness uh benefit of the doubt there's nothing wrong in that but we do not oblige people to repeat it once or twice or or more when they go back to sleep again
